Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<IServerPacket>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Deck
public class Deck
extends Observable<IServerPacket>
Represent the set of leader cards and the set of development cards, divided in smaller decks as the game specifies.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Deck()
    Constructs a new Deck, loading cards from the default game configurations.
    Deck​(java.util.List<LeaderCard> leaderCards, java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<CardColor,​java.util.Stack<DevelopmentCard>>> developmentCards)
    Constructs a new Deck with the given cards.

  • Method Summary

    DevelopmentCard getDevelopmentCardByUuid​(java.util.UUID uuid)
    Gets the DevelopmentCard with the given UUID.
    java.util.List<LeaderCard> initialDrawLeaders()
    This method is used in the first phase of the game, when players have to draw 4 leaders each.
    boolean isColorEmpty​(CardColor color)
    Checks if there are no DevelopmentCards of this color left in the Deck.
    void removeBoughtCard​(DevelopmentCard card)
    Removes a card from the Deck when bought.
    void removeTwoDevelopmentCards​(CardColor color)
    Removes two DevelopmentCards of the lowest level from the deck.
    void shuffleDevelopmentDeck()
    Shuffles the development cards.

    • getDevelopmentCardByUuid

      public DevelopmentCard getDevelopmentCardByUuid​(java.util.UUID uuid)
      Gets the DevelopmentCard with the given UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the uuid of the card to search for
      Returns:
      the development card with the given UUID or null if not found

    • shuffleDevelopmentDeck

      public void shuffleDevelopmentDeck()
      Shuffles the development cards.

    • initialDrawLeaders

      public java.util.List<LeaderCard> initialDrawLeaders()
      This method is used in the first phase of the game, when players have to draw 4 leaders each.
      Returns:
      a list of leader cards, the random draw of 4 leaders

    • removeBoughtCard

      public void removeBoughtCard​(DevelopmentCard card) throws java.util.EmptyStackException
      Removes a card from the Deck when bought.
      Parameters:
      card - the bought development card to remove.
      Throws:
      java.util.EmptyStackException - if the given card is not in the deck

    • removeTwoDevelopmentCards

      public void removeTwoDevelopmentCards​(CardColor color)
      Removes two DevelopmentCards of the lowest level from the deck.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the cards that will be removed

    • isColorEmpty

      public boolean isColorEmpty​(CardColor color)
      Checks if there are no DevelopmentCards of this color left in the Deck.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the cards to search for
      Returns:
      true if there are no more cards of this color
